entry.content:
Octopress is a very cool blog system, you can generae posts by jeklly.

And push your site to github.

Since I found my blog get a pr 2, I always think how to SEO my blog. And thkans to Google, I found some tools.

Add Original Link after the Post

Mr Sunshine write an article about how to add space between Chinese Word and English Word. Inspired by this, Kevin write a ruby plugin to add the original link after the octopress post. It is awesome.

And Tiny change the plugin to add the keyword after the octopress post also. So I just read the source code and add edit it for myself.

These are the source code for octopress-add-original-link.rb

The file is here—octopress-add-original-link.rb please use the below link to download the newer one

And the newer version that fix a bug is in add-original-link version2

And after I modified, It is only can show the post’s original link.

Before you use it, you need to edit your _config.yml, and add these.

original_url_pre: "The Original Link: "
license_url: /license
license_name: "CC BY-NC-SA 4.0"

The contents after : , you need edit them by yourself for your site.

Add Keywords and Description for the Post and the Page

It will look like this:

And what you need to do is just add post.puts "keywords: " post.puts "description: " in your Rakefile

Like this


  puts "Creating new post: #{filename}"
  open(filename, 'w') do |post|
    post.puts "---"
    post.puts "layout: post"
    post.puts "title: \"#{title.gsub(/&/,'&')}\""
    post.puts "date: #{Time.now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}"
    post.puts "comments: true"
    post.puts "categories: "
    post.puts "keywords: "
    post.puts "description: "
    post.puts "---"

Maybe you will need CTRL+Fto find the post.puts

And it is the same as adding the keywords and description to the page in octopress.

entry.title: Travel in Shenzhen City
entry.content:
You know Shenzhen is the most biggest 4 cities in China. And it is a Special Area in Ecnomic. And a citizen in Shenzhen can go to Hongkong freely. But the citizens in other part of China can not.

Sicerely, Shenzhen is a pretty fashion and open city. But there are still some China’s Characteristics in Shenzhen.

When I arrive in Luohu Port, I saw some young men sell milk powder. I do not know these young men are from Hongkong or Mainland, but they just sit near the port and sell the milk powder.

In China, there is an incident happend that milk powder is posionous. And some babies got sick by the posionous milk powder.

So someone smuggle milk powder from HK to CN.

And this is my first time to experience to see the milk powder from HK.

Out of the port building, there are a lot of people selling goods(I guess they are smuggled goods) in the square. There are too many to count the number.

The square is near the port and train station. And there are policemen or city managers. But they still sell the goods. And no policemen or city managers care about them. You know smugglling break the law.

I think because even policemen or city managers also want their babies have no-posion milk powder.

After the travel near the port. I went on the train to see the sea.

Follow the map’s direction, I came to A train stop near the sea.

And I walked to sourth by my feet.

I go across a residential district and in map, it is near the sea.

So I walked and foung the beach. Until I saw a tunnel under the highway. I go pass it. And I saw an armed policeman camp, but I did not care it and still went following the map.

I walked and walked, there was a cross.

2 policemen saw me and asked me what was I doing.

And I told them I came here to see the sea and the mangrove. And something about me.

They after me on the bikes, one on the bike told me he can give a drive.

entry.title: Take the mensa test
entry.content:
About 2 years ago, I wanted to join mensa. Cause in iqtest.dk, I have gotten a 130 score.

But you know in 2012, the mensa.org.cn showed the number in 2012 is to achieve the max number. So I waited.

And the mensa.org.cn showed test will open in 2013.

But in 2013, the test did not open until the December in 2013.

And I knew there was something happen in mensa-china. But recently, the mensa-china.com opened, although I would be in internship in April 19, I still decided to ask for leave to take the test.

But I found this test must be paid by paypal, and the method of paying the fee doesn’t support alipay or unipay card.

So i asked Brother Jun to help me pay the fee by using his credit card(both visa and unipay). But I ignored one thing that paypal need use the credit card of the account register.

Then one bad thing happend. I did not pay the fee successfully, and the credit card of Brother Jun was freezed.

After that day, I called paypal to solve this.

So I decide to registe a visa card, but I was just a student, so I could only a debit card, so I registed Minsheng Back Internation Debit Card(The program of regist needs 7 work days). And I asked more 2 days for leave to get the card.

When I came Xuzhou to get the card, I failed, cause the card did not arrive Minsheng Bank Xuzhou. I found one to transfer some dollars to my paypal account.

And I paid the fee.

In April 17, I left Pingdingshan City to Guangzhou City to take the test. In April 19, I took the test. And in the quiz after the test and a book, I got a highest score in who submit less in 25 minutes in my test batch(批次). It is really lucky, and may this little honor belong to God.
